General.Name: JNTC Co. Ltd
General.Description: JNTC Co., Ltd. provides connector, hinge, and tempered glass products in South Korea. Its connectors are used in mobile, notebook, and camera products; and tempered glass products are used in mobile, PMP, and other electronic products. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Hwaseong, South Korea. JNTC Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jinwoo Engineering Co., Ltd.
